styles.css: body{background-color:var(--mm-color-bg);color:var(--mm-color-text);} .wp-site-blocks{background-color:var(--mm-color-bg);} a:focus-visible,.wp-block-button__link:focus-visible,.wp-element-button:focus-visible,.wp-block-navigation-item__content:focus-visible{outline:2px solid var(--mm-color-gold);outline-offset:3px;box-shadow:0 0 0 3px rgba(11,11,15,.65);} .wp-block-button__link,.wp-element-button{background-color:var(--mm-color-gold);transition:background-color .2s ease,transform .2s ease,box-shadow .2s ease;color:var(--mm-color-black);} .wp-block-button__link:hover,.wp-element-button:hover{background-color:var(--mm-color-gold-strong);color:var(--mm-color-black);box-shadow:0 12px 32px rgba(0,0,0,.45);transform:translateY(-1px);} .wp-block-button.is-style-outline > .wp-block-button__link{background:transparent;border:1px solid var(--mm-color-gold);color:var(--mm-color-gold);} .wp-block-button.is-style-outline > .wp-block-button__link:hover{background-color:var(--mm-color-gold);color:var(--mm-color-black);} .wp-block-group.surface-card,.surface-card{background-color:var(--mm-color-surface);border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.04);box-shadow:var(--mm-shadow-soft);border-radius:20px;} .wp-block-navigation__container > li > .wp-block-navigation-item__content{position:relative;padding-bottom:0.35rem;} .wp-block-navigation__container > li.current-menu-item > .wp-block-navigation-item__content{color:var(--mm-color-gold);} .wp-block-navigation__container > li.current-menu-item > .wp-block-navigation-item__content::after,.wp-block-navigation__container > li > .wp-block-navigation-item__content:hover::after{content:'';position:absolute;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;height:2px;background-color:var(--mm-color-gold);} .wp-block-navigation__container > li > .wp-block-navigation-item__content:hover{color:var(--mm-color-gold-highlight, #DDBB74);} .wp-block-navigation-submenu__container{background-color:var(--mm-color-surface);border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.06);} .wp-block-site-title a{color:var(--mm-color-white);} .fluentform input,.fluentform select,.fluentform textarea,.wp-block-search__input{background-color:#14161B;border:1px solid #2A2D34;color:var(--mm-color-text);border-radius:10px;padding:0.75rem;} .fluentform input::placeholder,.fluentform textarea::placeholder,.wp-block-search__input::placeholder{color:var(--mm-color-muted);} .fluentform input:focus,.fluentform select:focus,.fluentform textarea:focus,.wp-block-search__input:focus{border-color:var(--mm-color-gold);box-shadow:0 0 0 1px rgba(198,161,91,0.4);outline:none;} .fluentform .ff-el-is-error .ff-el-input--label label,.fluentform .ff-el-is-error .ff-el-form-control,.fluentform .ff-el-is-error .ff-message-error{color:var(--mm-color-alert);border-color:var(--mm-color-alert);} .wp-block-gallery img,figure.wp-block-image img{border-radius:18px;box-shadow:var(--mm-shadow-soft);transition:transform .25s ease,box-shadow .25s ease;} .wp-block-gallery figure:hover img,figure.wp-block-image:hover img{transform:scale(1.01);box-shadow:0 20px 40px rgba(0,0,0,.55);} footer.wp-block-template-part{background-color:#08090C;border-top:1px solid #1B1D22;color:var(--mm-color-muted);} footer.wp-block-template-part a{color:var(--mm-color-gold);} footer.wp-block-template-part a:hover{color:var(--mm-color-gold-strong);} .wp-block-social-links .wp-social-link a{color:var(--mm-color-muted);} .wp-block-social-links .wp-social-link a:hover{color:var(--mm-color-gold);} .wp-block-separator{border-color:var(--mm-color-gold);} .has-brand-surface-background-color{color:var(--mm-color-text);} .editor-styles-wrapper{background-color:var(--mm-color-bg)!important;color:var(--mm-color-text)!important;} .editor-styles-wrapper .wp-block{color:var(--mm-color-text);} .editor-styles-wrapper .wp-block-navigation a{color:var(--mm-color-white);}
